dialogueLines.line: Hello, Dearie. Fancy meeting you here.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Oh, hey. I didn't realize you were here.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Say, since you're here anyways, why don't we have a song together?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Uh, I'd love to, but I'm a bit busy with-
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Are you sure you want to continue that sentence?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Err, I mean...I'd love to sing with you, Sweetie.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad
